reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son was asking for a computer but we didn't think he could care for something like that just yet. We bought him this instead and we are more than pleased. It came with everything he needed and he is still able yo play the games he wanted. We would consider buy another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice tablet, works well....but
reviews.reviewText: Product is fine, but have not been able to find a case that fits it. There does not seem to be a good answer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it
reviews.reviewText: I just received this item yesterday, it was well packaged and the item arrived as promised. This is my first tablet, so I can't really speak about how it stacks up to other tablets. I basically wanted the tablet with the same media features as my phone but with a larger screen. I plan on using it for reading kindle books, shopping, watching movies, accessing social media. For the price, I was not expecting something lightning fast...that is what my laptop and desktop are for if I am looking for speed. Having said that, it seems to be fast, given that is has a decent amount of memory and cpu speed. The keyboard, mouse and stylus work fine. It does not include batteries, but since I only use rechargeable batteries and have plenty of spare AAA batteries for peripherals such as mice and remote controls, this was a non-issue. The mouse uses 2 AAA batteries. I had no issues connecting with my broadband wifi and downloading apps. I haven't had it long enough to speak on the battery life, but so far I am 100% pleased. For new tablet users...I was initially annoyed that it was going to sleep and I had to enter the access code after 1 minute, but the screen sleep time can be changed in the settings, and there is also a setting that it will detect if you are holding it and it will not go to sleep while it is on your person, but you have to turn this feature on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it, don't buy
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this tablet only a few months ago. I find that the tablets become hot after only a short time of using them. As well as they don't keep a charge, internet disables itself, and lastly the tablet will not turn on. Not at all happy with this purchase. Waste of my money. Only getting one star because I have no choice but to give it a star

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter ordered this with birthday money and it has turned out to be just what she wanted. So far no problems and works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Trouble connecting to Wi-Fi.
reviews.reviewText: Every time a turn on the table I have to reboot to connect it to Wi-Fi. Not good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as great as an iPad!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this tablet!!! I'm not into apple products, I'm an Android girl all the way!!! But this tablet works perfect for me! And it made it easy for me to transfer everything from my phone and I mean everything. The only thing I didn't transfer are my phone calls and text messaging but I can still do video chats or ya call it Facetime, smdh, it's the same thing people Lol. Anyway if you're looking for something not too expensive and can do almost everything an iPad can do, I recommend this tablet all day. I'm about to order 3 more for the kids so they can have I too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed And Dangerous
reviews.reviewText: It was fine until it stopped working 9 months later. After removing the case I realized it stopped working because it overheated and melted the charging port. It could have started a fire! Not great battery life.
